text: O gün felaketlerle doluydu, nasıl hatırlarım?
english: That day was full of disasters, how can I remember it?
How can you not remember? How can you not remember?

text: Ne oldu söyle, ben de bileyim.
english: Tell me what happened, so I can know too.

text: Sen tüccarlığına bakasın, o bizim meselemizdir.

text: Beyim, bu adam Gündüz'ü gördüğünü söyler.

english: (Ertuğrul) What do you say? Tell me, where and when did you see it?

text: Bu Frenk... Frenk tüccarın dükkânına bakar, ayak işlerini görür.
english: This Frank... He looks after the Frankish merchant's shop, running errands for him.

text: Beyim, Emir Bahaddin'in ne gayeyle buraya geldiği zaten malumdur.
english: My lord, it is already clear what Emir Bahaddin's purpose is for coming here.

text: Lakin İlbilge Hatun neden hâlâ ateşe körükle gider, onu anlamam.
english: But I don't understand why İlbilge Hatun keeps adding fuel to the fire.

text: Bana itimat ettiğini söyleyen hatun, imdi ağzından ateşler saçar oldu.
english: The woman who said she trusted me is now spitting fire. There's more to this than meets the eye,

english: Mr. Artuk. I'll find out what happened.
...where were you? -Where is your older brother

text: Ben de azık bahanesiyle haber etmek için geldim.
english: I also came under the pretext of bringing provisions, but to actually deliver the news.

text: Abdurrahman, Alplere söyle, tez yola düşsünler.
english: Abdurrahman, tell the Alps to set off quickly. Let
them search every inch of Turna Hill.

text: Gündüz'e dair bir iz bulurlarsa haber etsinler.
english: If they find any trace of Gündüz, please let us know .
Why did you go with your brother, Osman?

text: Neden daha evvelden haber etmedin bize?
english: Why didn't you inform us sooner? I couldn't leave

text: Ağabeyimi o hâlde yalnız bırakamadım baba.
english: my brother alone in that state, Dad.

text: Anca beraber kanca beraber dedim. Yolda geri döndürürüm diye düşündüm.
english: I said, "We're in this together." I thought I'd turn it back on the way.

text: Lakin dönmeyince ben de azık bahanesiyle geldim.
english: But when he didn't return, I came under the pretext of bringing provisions.
Now go back to the camp. Your
grandmother must be worried about you.
angry with me? You say you
went to rescue your older brother .

text: Yine onu kurtarmak için haber etmeye geldin.
english: You came to deliver the news again, to rescue him.

text: ...Gündüz kendi başka bir yere mi gitti...

God willing, I will rescue Gündüz and bring him back.

give a verdict in absentia and demand his execution wherever he is found. If

text: Emir Hazretleri, kasabanın zangocu emriniz üzerine geldi.

text: Elbet bunun da vardır bir hikmeti.

also gave you a very courageous... ...righteous heart.

...then from now on you will work for me.
will give you a lot of gold.

you've seen, heard, and known. And

text: Bunlar altını kim verirse ona öterler.

This bell ringer will be of great use to us.
Why did Tekfur Yannis send you?
Tekfur Yannis is dead, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Daha bugün görüştüm kendisiyle, hiçbir şeyi yoktu.
english: I met with him today. He had nothing wrong with him.

text: Turgut Bey yanından ayrıldıktan sonra durumu fenalaşmış.
english: After Turgut Bey left, his condition worsened.

text: Biz de sizin kadar şaşırdık ölümüne.
english: We were just as surprised as you were by his death.
By the way, your son Gündüz...
What happened to my son Gündüz? He was caught hiding in

text: Kalede, gizli bir yerde saklanırken yakalandı.

How could such a thing happen?

text: Kaleye gizlice girdiği için Komutan Lais oğlunuzu tutukladı.

How can you arrest my brother? Don't you

text: Aramızda sulh de olsa, oğlunuz kalemize gizlice girmiştir Ertuğrul Bey.
english: if we are at peace, your son secretly entered our castle, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: Komutan Lais yarın sabah sizi kaleye davet ediyor.

text: Komutan Lais ne yapmak ister bilmem.
english: I don't know what Commander Lais wants to do.

text: Lakin eğer oğlumun kılına zarar gelirse...

text: ...o kaleyi onun başına yıkarım, bilmiş olsun.

You keep getting yourself from one trouble to another. You throw it.

text: Dipdiri adam bir anda nasıl ölür?

Why are they holding Gündüz captive? There's something

text: Bu hadiselerin altında bir bityeniği vardır beyim.

...they've set a trap for you too, son.
Either they'll easily hand over Gündüz...
...or I know how to take him.

text: Kim getirdi seni buraya? Nasıl girdin içeri?

What are you doing in this castle?

me, who did you collaborate with? -Gündüz.

I didn't ask for food from you, bell ringer. I brought
the feast you requested, my lady.

text: Aklını çeldiği zavallı masum yavrucak İrene'in kanatları altına gizlenmiş.

text: Ama hesaba katmadıkları bir şey olmuş hanımım.
english: But something happened that they didn't account for, my lady.

-I'll go and ask for him. -No, no, you can't go now.

text: Kızının bir Türk'le gönül ilişkisi olmasına...

...his old heart couldn't bear it any longer, he died.

text: Gittiği her yere ölüm ve acı götürür.

will want to get rid of him. I have no doubt that he

-Where is Commander Lais? -He is waiting for you in the Tekfur's room.

text: On yıldır bu saraya gelip giderim.

My swords have never been requested before.

text: Emir böyle Ertuğrul Bey, tedbiri elden bırakamayız.

Commander Lais will speak with you alone.
What are you afraid of? We've increased precautions not

text: Yalnız size karşı değil, herkese karşı önlemleri arttırdık.

All the burden is on my shoulders. I have to take

text: Oğlunuz işlediği cinayetlerden kaçmak için buraya sığınmış Ertuğrul Bey.

will pass judgment on my son myself.
Because your son entered our fortress without permission...
